org.epics.pvData.misc
Interface Executor

public interface Executor

Schedule a command to be executed via a thread. An Executor is created via ExecutorFactory.

Author:
mrk

Method Summary
 ExecutorNode createNode(java.lang.Runnable command)
          Create a node that can be passed to execute.
 void execute(ExecutorNode executorNode)
          Execute a command via a thread.
 void stop()
          Stop the executor.
